page.title: 07LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is not a resident{policeman}in the{Denwick area,}but a policeman regularly patrols the village in a police car.The police feel that this is sufficient security as there have been no{burglaries}in the village for a long time. The only disturbance that occurs in Denwick is{vandalism,} damaging the telephone box and spreading{litter.}Most litter is near the {one small bin}because it is rarely emptied.There has been some trouble with {Gipsies}who have been known to take advantage of the elderly population.The people of the village are happy with the policing of the area and like living in Denwick mainly because it is quiet and trouble free. They know eachother very well and soon realise if anything is not as it should be.
